first_frame_description: The shot continues with the woman speaking, her right hand resting over her chest, and the text 'IF YOU STILL' centered on the screen. A large, thick red arrow graphic appears, pointing sharply downward towards implicitly where a shopping link would be located. The doctor's office setting is clearly visible in the mid- to background, maintaining the professional atmosphere of the presentation.

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "If you still see the orange cart, that means they have not sold out yet. These usually sell out pretty fast"
shots.style: Call-to-action encouragement, urgency and scarcity marketing
shots.action: The woman directs the viewer to click the link/button to purchase, while reassuring them of availability and emphasizing scarcity.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare professional), red downward-pointing arrow graphic
shots.dialogue: If you still see the orange cart, that means they have not sold out yet. These usually sell out pretty fast
shots.composition: Medium close-up; prominent instructional graphic element
shots.camera_motion_positioning: Static, handheld selfie style (close to medium shot)

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "just because of the extremely low price they're offering it at."
shots.style: Urgency and scarcity marketing, scarcity-focused visual overlay
shots.action: The woman urges quick action due to high demand and low pricing, with visual support for the scarcity claim.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare professional), 'Sorry Out of Stock (lunavo)' signs on shelves (in inset video), red downward-pointing arrow graphic
shots.dialogue: just because of the extremely low price they're offering it at.
shots.context_environment: Doctor's office/clinic examination room, inset shows product shortage scenario
shots.ambiance_colour_lighting: Bright, clinical lighting; red and white contrast in the overlay highlights scarcity.
shots.camera_motion_positioning: Static, handheld selfie style (close to medium shot)
